response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. I understand its significance and would like to extend an offer that reflects its true worth. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit, providing you with access to an item that meets your needs and aspirations while allowing me to maximize the value of my investment. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 1200000}
